text: The President of the Chamber of Deputies (Spanish: Presidente de la Cámara de Diputados) is the leading officer of the Chamber of Deputies of Mexico. This position is the same as the Speaker of the House in other Legislatures. The incumbent president is vacant because Ifigenia Martínez y Hernández at dies. The President is elected for one-year term. ==References== *
title: President of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico)
